vsParam:
Ah, you guys are here.
I have a suitable job for you.

Wow... She assigns us works so smoothly
without saying anything...
Now she asks us to come here to work for her...

That's right. Even Cresson says things like
"accepting your fate"...

Alright, cut the crap.
I'll brief you.

Students of Mechanics plan to excavate the ruins
in order to finish their assignment...

But lots of monsters are spotted near the
location specified in the assignment.

They can't dig the ruins safely under such a situation,
hence they came ask for help from the Student Union.
Oh... It is indeed a troublesome problem.

Yeah. It's also the Student Union's job to make sure
students complete their assignments under a safe
environment, right?

So, the Student Union takes this issue
as a "commission" directly.

Humph. The Student Union really knows when to make
a move! Thank you very much, go get them——

Don't speak as if this is none of your business. This is
exactly why I asked you to come. Alright, follow me.

Uh!? Commissions undertaken by the Student Union
should be fulfilled by the Student Union!
Phew... We have killed all the monsters, right?
Yeah, I think we just did.

That's good... Uh? Hazel, look here!
What's that thing came out of the ground?

Huh? This... Could it be...
Dig it out!

What's this thing. A metal... box?
Looks pretty shiny...

It's an antique... And a mechanical antique!
We must study its internal structure!

Oh, I didn't expect to open its casing so easily.
The circuit inside... I've seen it before

Looks like a generating type... But this metal casing
seems to be protecting the internal circuit. So what is...

Ah, this hole, perhaps it serves to let to light pass.
Let's connect the circuit here... Wow, it's lit up!
I thought Hazel studies relicology, right?

She didn't hear us at all.
Just like Silver Birch Sensei...

Is that so?
Maybe Hazel likes mechanics?

Perhaps she only took this commission
just to see the antique with her own eyes?

T, that's because, my research direction is mechanical
civilization! Of course I'd want to have a close
observation of some related antique!

Alright, let's go back!
There's no more reason for us to stay here!

Ah, ah haha... No matter what,
Hazel is still the niece of "that" Silver Birch Sensei...
